item.title: You are the process
item.description: [[authors/alan watts|Alan Watts]], in [[books/out of your mind|Out of Your Mind]]: If there was a big bang at the beginning of time, you are not something that is the result of that explosion at the end of the process.

item.title: You’re a wiggle
item.description: [[authors/alan watts|Alan Watts]] in [[books/out of your mind|Out of Your Mind]]: See, the physical world is wiggly. Clouds, mountains, trees, people—everything is wiggly.

item.title: We are symptomatic of the universe
item.description: [[authors/alan watts|Alan Watts]] in [[books/out of your mind|Out of Your Mind]]: If there is any such thing as intelligence or love or beauty, you find it in other people.
